Description: Late Roman 1 pottery amphora; buff slip; red-painted Greek text on shoulder.
Curator's comments: Produced in Cyprus or south coast of Turkey, but presumably found in Egypt (D.M. Bailey)). For parallels, cf. ZPE 94 (1992): 135-51; Cahiers de la ceramique Egyptienne 4 (1996): 80 [8].
Bibliographic references: Hayes 1997 / Handbook of Mediterranean Roman pottery (pl.I)
